Lovely
What is Lovely?
Lovely is different.
Black.
White.
Tall.
Short.
Lovely.
Simple.
Complex.
Fluffy.
Sleek.
Lovely.
Soft.
Sharp.
Big.
Small.
Lovely.
Fancy.
Sporty.
Graceful.
Stompy.
Lovely.
Lovely is different,
weird,
and wonderful.
Lovely is You.
Lovely is Me.
We are all Lovely.

Author: Jess Hong
Illustrations: Simon Stahl
Print Publisher: Creston Books
